page.title: 07Health(Survey)
page.content: { {Smoking:}In our sample only 17% of the people admitted to smoking cigarettes and none of these smoked more than 20 each day. This indicates that people are heeding the health warnings surrounding smoking, and as a result the number of smokers in our area seems relatively low. {Alcohol:}30 of the sample admitted to drinking alcohol even though they were aware of it's health risks. However the proportion of people who drank daily was only 7%. Most people seemed to realise that heavy drinking is dangerous and as a result the other 93% only drank 2-3 times a week at the most (many of these only drank on special occasions such as Christmas and weddings).
